name: Der Pfad des Pinguins
storyline:
You wake up in a daze in a small village and can't remember anything.
You ask yourself, how did I get to this place?
You are cold and there is snow everywhere. Luckily there is a fire where you can warm yourself.

You have to find clothes. Otherwise you will freeze to death.

You follow the path out of the small village and come to a larger penguin settlement.

Many of the penguins are sick. The penguins give you food and clothes so you don't freeze. They tell you about the mysterious disease. You want to help the penguins to make a healing potion to make the sick penguins healthy again. But for this you need 4 different herbs, which grow on far away lands.

But where are these lands?
And how do you get there?
You find out that one herb grows only here in the cold snowy landscape. But the penguins don't know exactly where it grows.

You learn about other penguin settlements. You go in search of the other settlements to find out if they know the place where there is the herb you need.
And that's where your adventure begins...
summary:
You wake up in a snow-covered landscape and can't remember anything. You have to find out how you got to this place and survive. On your journey you meet penguins who confront you with a mysterious disease. Can you help the penguins?

This is a RPG Adventure Game!
